nodes.text: An Imperial officer was a Human male who served the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War between the Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. At some point during the conflict, the Imperial officer confronted an Ithorian Jedi, and attempted to shoot the Ithorian with his blaster pistol. However, the Jedi used a lightsaber to destroy the officer's blaster without harming him. The Imperial officer was fair-skinned with black eyes, and wore a gray officer's uniform.
The Imperial officer appeared on the card "Disarming Slash" from the Threat of the Conqueror expansion set of the Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game. The character was drawn by Ryan Barger.
